Thought so.$6"/pause 1500/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/speak Shane "@... I just need to get this off my chest, okay?#$b#Today was pretty bad for me.$3"/emote farmer 8/speak Shane "Don't worry, nothing happened.#$b#It's just... everything's been so heavy.$3"/pause 1000/emote Shane 28/pause 1000/speak Shane "Honestly, I'm starting to think that I'll feel this way for the rest of my life.$s#$b#And sometimes...$s#$b#Sometimes, I still wish I could just end it all.$3"/stopMusic/pause 1500/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 1000/speak Shane "I can't, though. I won't.$3#$b#I don't want you to worry. I'm never gonna do anything like that again.#$b#There are people depending on me. And there are lots of good things in my life."/playMusic SettlingIn/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Shane "I have you. And there's Jas, Marnie, the farm, the chickens.#$b#...There's no way I can just... leave.$3#$b#Even if I feel like I want to.$s#$b#There's no way I'm gonna just throw it all away."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/speak Shane "And I just wanna let you know that of all the good things keeping me here...#$b#You're my favorite.$6"/pause 500/emote Shane 40/speak Shane "Heh, that sounded really corny, didn't it?$6#$b#I meant it, though.$6"/pause 1000/showFrame Shane 34/positionOffset Shane -2 0/animate farmer false true 100 101/playSound dwop/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame Shane 12/pause 1000/speak Shane "Anyway, we should probably get some shut-eye.$6#$b#...Goodnight, @.$6"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end bed dialogue Shane "Come on, bud, let's get some sleep.$6"
